Macerated Strawberries


Ingredients
2 cups strawberries
2 teaspoons sugar

Cooking Instructions

Add strawberries to a container with a lid. Sprinkle sugar
over strawberries, and toss lightly. If desired, you can
crush a small amount of the strawberries, and leave some
whole. Refrigerate strawberries until they release juice,
about 1 hour, or up to overnight.
